command.name: unified-execute-with-file
command.description: Universal execution engine for consuming any planning/brainstorm/analysis output with minimal progress tracking, multi-agent coordination, and incremental execution

intent.primary_user_value: Execute one or more plan files (auto-detected or explicit) with structured, resumable progress tracking and optional git auto-commit.

reads: <plan paths from args or auto-detect under .workflow/>

must_not: Do not claim a pointer is Existing unless verifiable in the repo now.
Do not auto-commit unless --auto-commit is explicitly enabled.
Avoid destructive git operations without explicit user request/confirmation (unless -y/--yes semantics explicitly cover it).

p0: Core sections present: Overview/Usage/Execution Process/Outputs/Error Handling
No broken artifact references (writes are created by command; reads are existing inputs)
